title: Hot and Honey Pretzel'd Chicken Tenders

instructions.1: Dip chicken cubes into Honey Mustard sauce, then coat with crushed pretzels. Refrigerate 30 minutes to set.
instructions.2: Discard any unused sauce. Place chicken cubes on large ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees F, 10 to 12 minutes or until chicken is done. Sprinkle with Morton® Salt Substitute. Serve warm.
instructions.3: Honey Mustard Sauce: Combine ingredients until smooth.

questions.question: Is chicken cubes from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is chicken cubes live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
Can we dip (Step 1) and combine (Step 3) at the same time?
